steps.code:
<?php
include 'wordpress/wp-load.php';$common_tag = wp_insert_term( 'Common Tag', 'post_tag' );
$special_tag = wp_insert_term( 'Special Tag', 'post_tag' );
$post_ids = [];
for ( $i = 0; $i < 20; $i++ ) {
$random_title = 'Random Post ' . wp_generate_password( 7, false );
$postarr = [ 'post_title'  => $random_title, 'post_content' => 'This is a random post content.', 'post_status' => 'publish', 'post_type'  => 'post', 'tags_input' => [ $common_tag['term_id'] ] ];
$post_ids[] = wp_insert_post( $postarr );
}
$selected_posts = array_rand( $post_ids, 5 );
foreach ( $selected_posts as $post_id ) {
wp_set_object_terms( $post_ids[$post_id], $special_tag['term_id'], 'post_tag', true );}
